explanation: [0-0] On a football field, there is a player wearing a light gray tracksuit.

[0-4] Subsequently, the player runs and falls in front of a man in black. Then, there is a close-up of the man in black. The fallen player quickly gets up, and a player in light gray and black clothes appears in the shot. Afterward, the words "FOUL!" and "Penalty" appear successively.

[4-10] Immediately, the player in light gray clothes kicks the yellow football to a man in a black short-sleeved shirt, who catches it with his hands. Then the player in light gray raises an arm towards the camera, while the words "Ref! Fou!" appear on the screen. Subsequently, the player lowers his arm, looks at the camera, and walks away. At the same time, the words "Dancing on Ice!" appear.
